name: The Quest for the Winged Demon
name_original: The Quest for the Winged Demon
description:
A quick and simple 3D Roguelike adventure through 10 STUNNINGLY pixelated levels utilizing DRAMATIC point lighting and a complete lack of an ability to move BACKWARDS!

Key Features:

-  Two Distinct Potion Choices!

- Easy Item Destruction!

- No Spells! 

- Intense Melee Action!

- No Music, No Distractions!

Created in a week for the 2019 7DRL Challenge.
